channel.title: --=( Vengeance Error && wilderness Question. )=--
channel.description:
Hey, so heres the vengeance error...
When i use it, it's fine, but when someone dies...after i used on them, this error appears in my batch, cusing the server to crash meaning i have to reset it...
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.process(client.java:5861) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:54) [/code]
My wildy question is, in wildy when i use spells it just does a pathetic wind strike emotion but doesnt actually do a spell, but out of the wildy mage works fine..on npcs..
Any help on both of them? Vengeance is most important :)
Thanks alot guys...Please don't be dicks saying "learn to code" etc. i just want help not an argument.
Once again, thanx alot!

item.title: --=( Vengeance Error && wilderness Question. )=--
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

Hey, so heres the vengeance error…

When i use it, it’s fine, but when someone dies…after i used on them, this error appears in my batch, cusing the server to crash meaning i have to reset it…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.process(client.java:5861)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
        at server.main(server.java:54)

My wildy question is, in wildy when i use spells it just does a pathetic wind strike emotion but doesnt actually do a spell, but out of the wildy mage works fine…on npcs…

Any help on both of them? Vengeance is most important

Thanks alot guys…Please don’t be dicks saying “learn to code” etc. i just want help not an argument.

Once again, thanx alot!
